Text: A Limited Protest of Coral Energy Resources LP Cc Judge Brown and all parties in A and I Attached is the Limited Protest of Coral Energy Resources LP that we filed today with the CPUC San Diego office John Leslie CONFIDENTIAL Luce Forward Hamilton Scripps LLP West Broadway Suite San Diego CA The information contained in this electronic mail transmission is confidential and intended to be sent only to the stated recipient of the transmission It may therefore be protected from unauthorized use or dissemination by the attorneyclient andor attorney workproduct privileges If you are not the intended recipient or the intended recipients agent you are hereby notified that any review use dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited You are also asked to notify us immediately by telephone and to delete this transmission with any attachments and destroy all copies in any form Thank you in advance for your cooperation Original Message From Anderson David W Law mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Lindh Frank Law Bellenger Geoffrey empracom Williams Ray Litteneker Randall Law Berkovitz Trista Cc Witalis Lawrence Law Subject Email service list for A Re PGEs Open Season Application Due to the compressed time schedule for filing comments protests responses and replies in this Open Season Application docket Judge Brown has requested PGE to provide an email list that can serve as a supplementary means to speed service You are a recipient of that list This list of recipients was developed for use in PGEs Gas Accord II preliminary settlement discussions with parties and also includes other names from an email list used in I promising options PGE believes that use of this list will reach the great majority of if not all entitiespersons interested in participating in this application The Judge has requested the PGE provide this email list for use by the parties but only as a supplement to the parties use of the regular means of service As many of you know for service of the application PGE used the mail service list for I Dave Anderson PGE Law Dept See ADMINISTRATIVE LAW JUDGES RULING SHORTENING TIME FOR PROTESTS OR RESPONSES AND REPLIES TO THE APPLICATION FILED BY PACIFIC GAS AND ELECTRIC COMPANY issued June A v Coral EnergyLimited Protest A doc
